Articles.Content:
Thx for the info.

Anyone else know if having more then 1 OW on 1 ship will that increase the total mas of the ship I can build or are they counted as 2 seprate OWs?

License: Everything I make for KSP, I place into the public domain. The same cannot, unfortunately, be proved for Zorkinian, who originally made Orbital Construction. They never told me *not* to maintain their mod, so I did it.

The original Orbital Construction thread specifies a GPL license. Unless Zorkinian gave you explicit permission to release a derivative into the public domain, you must also release under GPL because it's a copyleft license.

Your last sentence there is entirely the wrong way to go about licensing. It's also false; the GPL describes the terms under which you may release derivatives.

(I realize there is now another maintainer who's released "re-redux" but the licensing terms in this post are misleading and could lead to derivatives which aren't properly licensed.)
Has anybody checked if this works in 0.23.5?

Has anybody checked if this works in 0.23.5?

I strayed across a re-redux version for KSP 0.23.5 when checking for mod updates recently.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56140-0-23-5-Orbital-Construction-Re-Redux-v1-1-1
